author: rdonkin
msg: Added ability to load xml rules from org.xml.sax.ImputSource to DigesterLoader

author: rdonkin
msg: Modified internal entity resolver so that it will try the SYSTEM id if the PUBLIC id is null. Patch submitted by Henri Gomez. Also added getter and setter for SAX logger.

author: rdonkin
msg: Patched build script so that the logging output (which often confused new developers) can be easily supressed. Patch submitted by Simon Kitching.

author: rdonkin
msg: Removed system.out's from tests. Patch submitted by Simon Kitching.
